categories.description: Biomedical Concept category for the faciliation of API search and extract

conceptId.description: A unique identifier for a Biomedical Concept which will be assigned as the NCIt code if it exists or a placeholder identifier if the concept is not yet available in NCIt

definition.description: NCIt definition for the Biomedical Concept; provisional defintion if concept is not available in NCIt

href.description: URI link to NCIt for the Biomedical Concept; blank if  concept is not available in NCIt

ncitCode.description: NCIt C-code for the Biomedical Concept

packageDate.description: Biomedical Concept package release date indicating when the BC package was published to production

parentConceptId.description: C-code for the parent concept in the NCIt hiearchy; blank if concept is not available in NCIt

resultScales.description: Scale of measurement for the Biomedical Concept result

shortName.description: NCI Preferred Name for the concept; provisional name will be used if concept is not available in NCIt

synonyms.description: Biomedical Concept synonym equivalent to BC short name for the facilitation of API search and extraction

code.description: Synonym concept for the Biomedical Concept as defined in a code system

system.description: Identifies the code system for the synonym concept. The URL of the code system should be used if it exists

systemName.description: Human-readable name for the code system

conceptId.description: An identifier for a Data Element Concept (DEC) which will be assigned as the NCIt code if it exists or a placeholder identifier if the concept is not yet available in NCIt

dataType.description: Data Type for the Data Element Concept

exampleSet.description: Example values for the Data Element Concept

href.description: Link to NCIt for the Data Element Concept

ncitCode.description: NCI C-code for the BC Data Element Concept

shortName.description: NCI Preferred Name for the concept; provisional name will be used if concept is not available in NCIt
